cgcloud__Tour_Template_Object_Reference_.name: cgcloud__Tour_Template_Object_Reference__c
cgcloud__Tour_Template_Object_Reference_.description: Stores the details of the object references of a tour template.

cgcloud__End_Of_Day__c.description: The respective template is only available within the end-of-day activities of the tour.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the tour template object reference record.

cgcloud__Start_Of_Day__c.description: The respective template is only available within the start-of-day activities of the tour.
